summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of RallyDesk multi-sport tournament platform. All 24 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified login, registration, dashboard, tournament detail pages, and CRUD dialogs.

issues: Date picker appears using shadcn Calendar component correctly - good design

critical_code_review_comments: All endpoints are properly using JWT authentication and role-based access control
MongoDB ObjectId is correctly excluded using '_id': 0 projection throughout
API URL is properly fetched from environment variables
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Created multiple TEST_ prefixed users, players, resources, and competitions during testing. Test tournament ID: f8eb0a09-6bc3-4735-8a57-55bb48a5c836 exists with 5 players, 5 resources, and 2 competitions.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_rallydesk_api.py using pytest. All auth, tournament, player, resource, competition, and dashboard stats APIs are tested. Frontend UI tests covered login, registration, dashboard, tournament detail page tabs (competitions, players, resources, settings), and dialog popups for adding entities. All features are working correctly.

frontend_tests: Dashboard loads with stats cards - PASSED
Tab navigation (Competitions, Players, Resources, Settings) - PASSED
